alert.note: Alert for Adair; Audubon; Cass; Dallas; Guthrie; Madison (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 4:36AM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Madison, northeastern Cass, Guthrie, southern Audubon, southwestern Dallas and Adair Counties through 515 AM CST... At 436 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles north of Atlantic to near Greenfield. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Greenfield around 440 AM CST. Stuart around 500 AM CST. Guthrie Center and Panora around 505 AM CST. Earlham and Lake Panorama around 510 AM CST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Exira, Redfield, Diamondhead Lake, Lake Anita State Park, Fontanelle, Adair, Yale, Greenfield Municipal Airport, Nodaway Park and Anita. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 60 and 107. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Audubon; Cass; Dallas; Guthrie; Madison
